anime.text: I watch a lot of anime, and with a lot I really mean A LOT. My record is 50+ episodes in 1 day, that is over 16 hours of watching. School does ruin it tho, I am not able to watch a lot anymore because of that. Anyways, you can check what I watched/want to watch here. Additionally you can checkout my MyAnimeList profile as well!
